spell_tooltip.description: Every 3 sec while Clash is off cooldown, your next Clash can be reactivated immediately to wildly Clash an additional enemy. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

Heals the target for 1.3 million over 6.7 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Heals the target for 1.3 million over 6.7 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Kick upwards, dealing 457,222 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 458,401 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Reduces all damage taken by you and your target while channeling Soothing Mists by 6%.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.
While out of combat, your movement speed is increased by 15%.
Paralysis now removes all Enrage effects from its target.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 27,083 Nature damage or 109,812 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Find resilience in the flow of chi in battle, gaining a magic absorb shield for 1.0% of your max health every 3 sec in combat, stacking up to 10%.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 30% and reducing all damage you take by 30%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your physical damage taken is reduced by 10% and an additional 10% every 4 sec until you receive a physical attack.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
Increases your maximum health by an additional 10% and your damage taken is reduced by an additional 10% while Fortifying Brew is active.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 40% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 446,629 over 6 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 30%. 

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 372,910 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.7 million damage.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 281,674 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.

Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 5.1 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.4 sec to restore 44,625 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 148,888, reduced beyond 5 allies.

Rising Sun Kick now kicks up a Gust of Mist to heal 2 allies within 40 yds for 99,009. 

Spinning Crane Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to kick up a Gust of Mist to heal 1 ally within 40 yds for 98,140.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.8 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
The absorb amount of Life Cocoon is increased by 80%.
Vivify critical strikes and Rising Sun Kicks reduce the remaining cooldown on Revival by 1 sec, and Revival heals targets for 15% of Revival's heal over 10 sec.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 186,922 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 12 sec that kicks up 3 Gust of Mists when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 97,867, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
After you fully consume Thunder Focus Tea, your next Vivify triggers Zen Pulse.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
Reduces the cooldown of Life Cocoon by 45 sec.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 146,872 over 6 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 1.2 million damage for 10 sec.
Renewing Mist increases its target's healing received from you by 50% for the first 8 sec of its duration, but cannot jump to a new target during this time.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 4 nearby allies for 166,306 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 4 sec while in combat.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec, dealing 99,817 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 205,438 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path.

Your abilities have a 6% chance of resetting the cooldown of Jadefire Stomp while fighting within the path.
Reduces the cooldown of Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane by 1 min, but decreases its duration to 12 sec.
Casting Thunder Focus Tea increases your next Crackling Jade Lightning's damage by 2,000% and causes it to chain to 4 additional enemies at 25% effectiveness.

Your abilities reset Jadefire Stomp 100% more often. While within Jadefire Stomp, your Tiger Palms strike twice, your Blackout Kicks strike an additional 2 targets at 20% effectiveness, and your Spinning Crane Kick heals 3 nearby allies for 120% of the damage done.

After casting Jadefire Stomp or Thunder Focus Tea, Ancient Teachings transfers an additional 215% damage to healing for 15 sec.

While Jadefire Teachings is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

After using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 15% of a stat for 10 sec:
Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery
Rising Sun Kick: Versatility
Expel Harm: Versatility
Increases Sheilun's Gift cloud of mist generation to every 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick heals all allies with your Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist for 28,898, and extends those effects by 4 sec, up to 100% of their original duration.
Sheilun's Gift heals 2 additional allies and its cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.

Store vitality from 10% of your damage dealt and 30% of your healing. Vitality stored from overhealing is reduced.

For 10 sec after casting Thunder Focus Tea your spells and abilities draw upon the stored vitality to deal 40% additional healing over 8 sec.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 50% increased damage and healing.
During Aspect of Harmony, Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm also withdraw vitality to damage enemies for an additional 20% over 8 sec.
Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 3%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.
Tiger's Lust grants 20% movement speed to up to 2 allies near its target.
Thunder Focus Tea has 1 additional charge.
When cast on yourself, your single-target healing spells heal for 10% more and restore an additional 179,510 health over 6 sec.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm deal 5% additional damage to enemies in a line in front of you. Damage reduced above 5 targets.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm contribute 30% additional vitality.
Casting Vivify stores 109,591 vitality, increased based on your recent Gusts of Mist.

When Aspect of Harmony deals damage or heals, it has a chance to spread to a nearby target. When you directly attack or heal an affected target, it has a chance to intensify.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.

Heals the target for 1.3 million over 6.7 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Heals the target for 1.3 million over 6.7 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.

Applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.4 sec to restore 44,625 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 150,166, reduced beyond 5 allies.

Rising Sun Kick now kicks up a Gust of Mist to heal 2 allies within 40 yds for 102,065. 

Spinning Crane Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to kick up a Gust of Mist to heal 1 ally within 40 yds for 97,462.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.8 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 1.2 million damage for 10 sec.
Renewing Mist increases its target's healing received from you by 50% for the first 8 sec of its duration, but cannot jump to a new target during this time.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 4 nearby allies for 166,306 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 4 sec while in combat.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec, dealing 97,825 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 202,668 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path.

Your abilities have a 6% chance of resetting the cooldown of Jadefire Stomp while fighting within the path.
Reduces the cooldown of Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane by 1 min, but decreases its duration to 12 sec.

While Jadefire Teachings is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery

Expel Harm: Versatility

Sheilun's Gift heals 2 additional allies and its cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.

Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm contribute 30% additional vitality.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.
Reduces the cooldown of Fortifying Brew by 50%.
Guard the 4 closest players within 15 yards for 15 sec, allowing you to Stagger 20% of damage they take.
Your next Keg Smash deals 50% additional damage, and stuns all targets it hits for 3 sec.

Heals the target for 1.3 million over 6.7 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Kick upwards, dealing 466,913 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 456,723 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds

Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Increases all damage dealt by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 30% and reducing all damage you take by 30%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 26,822 Nature damage or 113,361 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Expel Harm's critical healing is increased by 15%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.
Your dodge chance is increased by 5%.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 8% increased healing taken from all sources.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 80% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Summons a Black Ox Statue at the target location for 15 min, pulsing threat to all enemies within 20 yards.

You may cast Provoke on the statue to taunt all enemies near the statue.
Smash a keg of brew on the target, dealing 90,751 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yds and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Clears 60% of your damage delayed with Stagger.

Niuzao's teachings allow you to shuffle during combat, increasing the effectiveness of your Stagger by 100%.

Shuffle is granted by attacking enemies with your Keg Smash, Blackout Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick.

When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 400,903.

Rising Sun Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 388,000.
Purify 5% of your Staggered damage each time you gain 3 sec of Shuffle duration.
Dealing damage with Blackout Kick increases the damage of your next Keg Smash by 10%, stacking up to 4 times.

Drinking from your Brews has a 100% chance to toss a keg high into the air that lands nearby after 3 sec, dealing 65,608 damage to all enemies within 8 yards and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

A swig of strong brew that coalesces purified chi escaping your body into a celestial guard, absorbing 1.2 million damage.

Purifying Stagger damage increases absorption by up to 200%.
Reduces all damage taken by 60% for 8 sec. Being hit by a melee attack, or taking another action will cancel this effect.

Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing 49,449 Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Targets affected by Keg Smash will also burn, taking 40,261 Fire damage and dealing 5% reduced damage to you for 12 sec.
Purifying Brew increases the absorption of your next Celestial Brew by up to 200%, based on Stagger purified.
Purifying Brew now has 2 charges.
Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.
Blackout Kick's damage increased by 20% and it strikes an additional 2 targets.
When you use Keg Smash, the remaining cooldown on Breath of Fire is reset.
Chug some Black Ox Brew, which instantly refills your Energy, Purifying Brew charges, and resets the cooldown of Celestial Brew.

Summons an effigy of Niuzao, the Black Ox for 12 sec. Niuzao attacks your primary target, and frequently Stomps, damaging all nearby enemies.

While active, 40% of damage delayed by Stagger is instead Staggered by Niuzao.
Gain up to 15% Mastery based on your current level of Stagger.
Activating Purifying Brew or Celestial Brew grants you 10% dodge for 5 sec.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, your next Tiger Palm or Spinning Crane Kick deals 100% increased damage.

Your Breath of Fire ignites your right leg in flame for 8 sec, causing your Blackout Kick and Spinning Crane Kick to deal 50% additional damage as Fire damage and refresh the duration of your Breath of Fire on the target.

Stagger is 2% more effective at delaying damage.

You gain up to 5% Haste based on your current level of Stagger.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 10% damage. Blackout Kick critical hits grant an additional 2 stacks of Elusive Brawler.

Hurl a brew created from the bones of your enemies at the ground, coating all targets struck for 10 sec. Your abilities have a 50% chance to affect the target a second time at 50% effectiveness as Shadow damage or healing.

Gust of Mists heals targets with your Bonedust Brew active for an additional 153,042.

Hurls a flaming keg at the target location, dealing 259,684 Fire damage to nearby enemies, causing your attacks against them to deal 20,130 additional Fire damage, and causing their melee attacks to deal 100% reduced damage for the next 3 sec.

Your main hand auto attacks reduce the cooldown on your brews by 0.5 sec and block your target's chi, dealing 20,130 additional Nature damage and increasing your damage dealt by 1% for 20 sec. 

Upon reaching 10 stacks, your next cast of Rising Sun Kick or Keg Smash consumes all stacks to strike again at 100% effectiveness. This bonus attack can trigger effects on behalf of Tiger Palm at reduced effectiveness.
Your abilities have a low chance to cast Bonedust Brew at your target's location.
Keg Smash deals 20% additional damage, and has 1 additional charge.

Heals the target for 1.3 million over 6.7 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 465,506 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds

Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Expel Harm's critical healing is increased by 15%.
Find resilience in the flow of chi in battle, gaining a magic absorb shield for 1.0% of your max health every 3 sec in combat, stacking up to 10%.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 8% increased healing taken from all sources.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.
Your attacks have a chance to resonate, dealing 13,601 Nature damage to enemies within 8 yds.
Summons a White Tiger Statue at the target location for 10 sec, pulsing 60,452 damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 10 sec.

Pummels all targets in front of you, dealing 625,681 Physical damage to your primary target and 337,867 damage to all other enemies over 3.3 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Can be channeled while moving.
Absorbs all damage taken for 10 sec, up to 50% of your maximum health, and redirects 70% of that amount to the enemy target as Nature damage over 6 sec.
Increases your maximum Chi by 1, maximum Energy by 20, and your Energy regeneration by 10%.

While out of combat, your Chi balances to 2 instead of depleting to empty.

Every 15 sec, your next Tiger Palm also casts Expel Harm and deals 30% additional damage.

 Expel Harm
Expel negative chi from your body, healing for 1.1 million and dealing 25% of the amount healed as Nature damage to an enemy within 20 yards.
Spinning Crane Kick radius increased by 15%.
Fists of Fury damage increased by 20%.
Fists of Fury damage increased by 15%. When Fists of Fury deals damage, it has a 5% chance to refund 1 Chi.

Spinning Crane Kick's damage is increased by 18% for each unique target you've struck in the last 20 sec with Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, or Rising Sun Kick. 

Stacks up to 5 times and only applies to the primary target of each effect.

Soar forward through the air at high speed for 1.5 sec.
 
If used again while active, you will land, reducing the movement speed of enemies within 8 yds by 70% for 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick has a chance equal to 100% of your haste to trigger a second time, dealing 317,555 Physical damage and restoring 1 Chi.
Blackout Kick damage increased by 10% and strikes an additional 2 targets at 80% effectiveness.
Increases maximum Energy by 30. Tiger Palm's Energy cost reduced by 5.
Strike with both fists at all enemies in front of you, dealing 444,233 Physical damage and reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.
Spending Chi has a chance to make your next Spinning Crane Kick free and deal an additional 200% damage.
The duration of Storm, Earth, and Fire is extended by 0.25 sec for every Chi you spend.
Each successive attack that triggers Combo Strikes in a row grants 1% increased damage, stacking up to 5 times.
Touch of Death deals 20% increased damage and can be used a second time within 5 sec before its cooldown is triggered.
Summons an effigy of Xuen, the White Tiger for 7 sec. Xuen attacks your primary target, and strikes 3 enemies within 10 yards every 0.8 sec with Tiger Lightning for 30,934 Nature damage.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 20% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.

Strike of the Windlord grants you 4 stacks of Thunderfist and an additional stack for each additional enemy struck. 

Thunderfist discharges upon melee strikes, dealing 145,992 Nature damage.
Spinning Crane Kick damage increased by 20% and its radius is increased by 15%.
Your Combo Strikes grant a stacking 1% chance for your next Fists of Fury to grant 3% critical strike, haste, and mastery and invoke Xuen, The White Tiger for 10 sec.
Xuen strikes your enemies with Empowered Tiger Lightning every 4 sec, dealing 8% of the damage you and your summons have dealt to those targets in the last 4 sec.

Rising Sun Kick critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Fists of Fury by 4 sec.

When Fists of Fury ends, the critical strike chance of Rising Sun Kick is increased by 40% for 5 sec.
Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick increase damage dealt by your next Fists of Fury by 3%, stacking up to 10 times.
Tiger Palm also applies an effect which increases your critical strike chance by 15% for 6 sec on the target. This effect cannot be applied more than once every 30 sec per target.
You gain 20% haste for 8 sec after summoning your Celestial.
